words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Can I have a glass of water, please?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: क्या मुझे एक गिलास पानी मिल सकता है, कृपया?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Would you like some tea?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: क्या आप कुछ चाय लेंगे?
words.notes: Tea is an extremely popular drink in India, often prepared with milk and spices.

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I drink coffee every morning.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मैं हर सुबह कॉफी पीता हूँ।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Children should drink milk every day.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: बच्चों को हर दिन दूध पीना चाहिए।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I eat bread for breakfast.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मैं नाश्ते में रोटी खाता हूँ।
words.notes: Roti is a round flatbread, while western-style bread is sometimes called 'double roti'

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Rice is a staple food in many countries.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: चावल कई देशों का मुख्य भोजन है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: You should eat more vegetables.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपको अधिक सब्जियाँ खानी चाहिए।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Fruits are good for your health.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: फल आपके स्वास्थ्य के लिए अच्छे हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Many people eat meat every day.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: कई लोग हर दिन मांस खाते हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I like to eat fish.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मुझे मछली खाना पसंद है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Let's cook chicken for dinner.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: चलिए रात के खाने के लिए मुर्गा पकाते हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I eat two eggs for breakfast.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मैं नाश्ते में दो अंडे खाता हूँ।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Add a little salt to the dish.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: व्यंजन में थोड़ा नमक डालें।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Would you like sugar in your tea?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: क्या आप अपनी चाय में चीनी लेंगे?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Indian food can be very spicy.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: भारतीय खाना बहुत मसालेदार हो सकता है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I like sweet desserts.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मुझे मीठे मिठाई पसंद हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Let's go to a restaurant for dinner.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: चलिए रात के खाने के लिए रेस्तरां चलते हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Can I see the menu, please?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: क्या मैं मेन्यू देख सकता हूँ, कृपया?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: नाश्ता दिन का सबसे महत्वपूर्ण भोजन है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: What would you like for lunch?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आप दोपहर के खाने में क्या लेना चाहेंगे?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: We usually eat dinner at 8 PM.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: हम आमतौर पर रात 8 बजे खाना खाते हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Can we have the bill, please?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: क्या हमें बिल मिल सकता है, कृपया?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Excuse me, waiter!
words.exampleSentenceHindi: माफ कीजिए, वेटर!

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: The food is delicious!
words.exampleSentenceHindi: खाना स्वादिष्ट है!

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I am hungry.
words.notes: Use 'bhookhaa' for males and 'bhookhee' for females.
